title: Challenger Nidalee Unavailable?
body:
Hi, I was wondering why Challenger Nidalee is shown on the store page, yet unavailable? I literally just bought nidalee because I saw that skin on her page, but now it says its unavailable.

Is this a glitch? And if not, when will it go back on sale? I thought they usually take the skins off the page when they go offsale.

replies.body:
Hey Duke of Lords -

Where are you seeing this? She is legacy, and shouldn't be available at this time, as far as I know.

It's not that she's available to buy, but that she shows up on the champion info card when other legacy's don't.

[http://imgur.com/2sdNQOD](http://imgur.com/2sdNQOD)

[http://imgur.com/kko5fdd](http://imgur.com/kko5fdd)
D'oh! Gotcha. Thanks, we'll get this resolved.
The challenger skins are legacy skins, only available at certain times. The next guaranteed time is the start of the 2017 season

Yes but usually they take legacy skins off the store page viewing. Hers is still up there. It was up there yesterday too. Why would they keep an unavailable skin on display?

I literally only bought nidalee for that skin.

Hiya! 

Challenger Nidalee isn't available at this time, as she is legacy. Even in the Champion Details Page, it does say that she is unavailable. That said, she does make periodic returns to the store!
